headline: Citi says this sector remain compelling despite tariff hit
summary: Investing.com -- Citi says this sector remains attractive even as new tariffs drag on consumer spending. The brokerage resumed coverage on U.S. advertising giants Omnicom and Interpublic Group with Buy ratings.
